availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Married Catharine Dinsmore on October 18, 1852. He owned 11 slaves and served as the provincial judge of Harrison County.

bibl.p: Find A Grave,” Marquis ‘Marc’ Lafayette Broadwell (February 22, 1829-July 4, 1870,” Memorial #19079580, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=19079580 (accessed June 4, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Harrison, Cynthiana, p. 19; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Harrison, Cynthiana, p. 3-4; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000216896, Harrison County Marriages, p. unknown.
